name: Adventure on a Boat!
overview: Adventure on a Boat! is a simple adventure game for the 8-bit Atari. The player sails on an 8 x 8 board, and each movement costs 5 minutes. In each location, the player can choose to fish, where they randomly receive an encounter. Encounters each use 5 minutes of time. The player can find treasures and a variety of items to enhance or hinder their fishing expedition. The player can find keys to unlock chests, shields which can protect the player if they find a bomb, and enchanted swords that protect from pirate attacks. If the player moves off the map, the fishing expedition is over.
